mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (ID, TITLE, CODE, FLAG, INTRO, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSER, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYUSER ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
